title.narrative: Reaching Priority Populations with HIV Services Project (RPP-HIV Project)

description.narrative:
JHPIEGO received funding for a new project aimed to improve the health status of priority populations (PPs) in Ivory Coast through the increase access to quality HIV testing, age-appropriate counseling, enrollment in ARV services and follow-up, including adherence support.
AVSI is a sub-grantee of this 5-year long project and will focus on the OVC component. The goal of the OVC component is to improve the capacity of households to provide for the basic needs of their children, prevent infection by HIV and control the epidemic when the disease is present in the household.
AVSI will complement the robust health systems strengthening work and integrated chronic care model led by JHPIEGO in collaboration with the hospitals and health care centers in the region with a parallel but well integrated OVC program that is based on the latest evidence and cutting edge innovation.
